title: Yeti
summaries: The Yeti is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns during the Frost Moon event, in its later waves. It behaves similarly to Krampus and the Nutcracker, although it is much stronger and is immune to knockback.
Defeating a Yeti adds 18 points (<abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">36 points</abbr>) during the Frost Moon.

statistics.Damage: 140/280/420
statistics.Max Life: 3500/7000/10500
statistics.Banner: [img:Yeti Banner]Yeti Banner
